title: Download freezes when patching the game

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
When downloading the game , it freezes suddenly after a random amount of time .
Disabled avast,firewall, still won't work

replies.body: Your client might be having a hard time scanning all the game files it needs to for the update. Let's try updating your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) first, as that typically does the trick. Hit me back up and let me know if that doesn't help though!
